concept.title: Additional information types
concept.shortdesc: When you have content that belongs to a different type, find the closest fit from among the existing types.

conbody.p: Often the closest fit will be the reference type. There are many different kinds of reference information, and for now all of them need to be authored using the same reference topic type.

If your content doesn't match any of the specific types DITA provides, you can author it as generic topics. However, make absolutely sure it is not in fact just a particular kind or flavour of an existing type.
